title: Convergence of Ricci flow on $R^2$ to plane

title_detail.value: Convergence of Ricci flow on $R^2$ to plane

summary:
In this paper, we give a sufficient condition such that the Ricci flow in
$R^2$ exists globally and the flow converges at $t=\infty$ to the flat metric
on $R^2$.

LI MA
Abstract. In this paper, we give a sufficient condition such that the
Ricci flow in R2 exists globally and the flow converges at t = ∞ to the
flat metric on R2 .
Mathematics Subject Classification 2000: 53Cxx,35Jxx
Keywords: Ricci flow, maximum principle, convergence
